General.Name: Gongniu Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Gongniu Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of civil electrical products. It offers power strips, high-end surge protectors, and USB power strips, as well as smart WiFi sockets, USB travel power adapters, digital timers, and power transformers; digital accessories, such as car chargers, USB cables, and power banks; decorative switches and sockets; and eye-care LED lights. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Cixi, China.
